name: The Far Rings
description:
Available as download on PC, Mac, Linux.

"Play as Athena, a doctor of mixed heritage torn between two worlds, as she tries to find her true home alongside two possible suitors!"

Summary: At the tail end of a galactic war, Athena, a humanitarian medic, finds herself alone on a transport ship with a dashing captain she might remember from a distant past and an alien war criminal who doesn't quite look the part. In three days, their ship will reach the planet she used to call home, but perhaps Athena must choose a new future, and may even find love, from the struggles she and her two companions will encounter.

Made in 48 hours as part of Global Game Jam 2019 with the theme of "What does  home mean to you?"

Part 1 of a 2-part story. We expect to be finished Part 2 sometime in February. The full game will feature a 12k script with 5 endings and 2 CGs.
